headline: Jim Cramer Says “Buy Procter & Gamble”
summary: The Procter & Gamble Company (NYSE:PG) is one of the 25 stocks Jim Cramer recently shared insights on. Cramer recommended the company stock for investors who want consumer packaged goods stocks. He said: “You want consumer packaged goods? Well, then that’s easy.
